truffle-announces-2nd-annual-trufflecon.title: Truffle Announces 2nd Annual TruffleCon
truffle-announces-2nd-annual-trufflecon.excerpt: Truffle is pleased to announce TruffleCon 2019, a conference for the users of Truffle, a suite of tools for software developers, fans, and enthusiasts building decentralized applications powered by blockchain technologies.
